Name: Wild Mushroom Cream Soup
Description: A variety of hand-picked mushrooms, cooked to perfection, mixed in with velvety cream and served with freshly chopped scallions.

Name: French Onion Soup
Description: Slow simmered sweet onions, topped with savory Swiss Cheese and garnished with croutons.

Name: Calamari
Description: Breadcrumbed squid sautéed in garlic, lemon and parsley with tartare sauce.

Name: Goats Cheese Salad
Description: Warm goats cheese and roasted vegetable salad with black olive tapenade crostini.

Name: House Salad
Description: Grape tomatoes + red onion + cheddar cheese + croutons.

Name: Spinach and Mushroom Crêpes
Description: Baked crêpes with wild mushrooms, spinach and Gruyère cheese.

Name: Chicken and Walnut Salad
Description: Chargrilled chicken with avocado, baby gem lettuce, baby spinach, shallots, French beans, walnuts, croutons and a mustard dressing.

Name: Bacon Mac ‘n Cheese Spring Rolls
Description: Bacon and green chili mac and cheese with a side of ranch.

Name: French Fries
Description: Cut from whole potatoes grown on Canadian farms, our fries are cooked to golden perfection in a vegetable oil blend.

Name: Shrimp Cocktail
Description: 6 house-poached large shrimp + fresh vegetable slaw + ginger cocktail sauce.

Name: Chorizo and Egg Sliders
Description: Chorizo patty with aged white cheddar, scrambled egg and house-roasted tomatillo salsa.

Name: Eggs Benedict
Description: Served with savory house potatoes.

Name: Caramelized French Toast
Description: Cinnamon French toast infused with coconut rum + maple syrup + fresh strawberries. Non-alcoholic/kid-friendly version available upon request.

Name: Guac & Chips
Description: Homemade guacamole + tortilla chips + fresh salsa.

Name: Quesadillas
Description: Jack + cheddar + pepper jack cheese + grilled peppers.

Name: Cheese Burger
Description: Our simple, classic cheeseburger begins with a 100% pure beef burger seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper.

Name: Grilled Dory Burger
Description: Grilled Dory, pickled red onion, iceberg lettuce topped with our home-made tartare sauce.

Name: Veggie Burger
Description: Chipotle-spiced black bean patty with avocado, red onion, tomato and red leaf lettuce.

Name: Fried Chicken Sandwich
Description: Spicy, marinated, fried chicken breast with brioche bun and cilantro slaw.

Name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
Description: Lettuce + tomato + red onion + Dijon-aioli.

Name: Turkey & Avocado Wrap
Description: Freshly sliced oven-roasted turkey + avocado + carrots + cucumber + lettuce + tomato + chipotle aioli.

Name: Sunrise Burger
Description: Pecanwood-smoked bacon with cheddar cheese and fried egg, lettuce, tomato and onion.

Name: Roasted Pork Belly
Description: Pan roasted pork belly with gratin potato, braised Savoy cabbage, apples, thyme and calvados sauce.

Name: Chocoholic's Cheesecake
Description: Creamy chocolate cheesecake nested in dark, moist brownie, sprinkled with chocolate flakes.

Name: Sensational S’mores
Description: Marshmallow-filled chocolate chip cookie sandwiches.

Name: Screwdriver
Description: Blood Orange Vodka + fresh orange juice.

Name: Zing Zang Bloody Mary
Description: Tito’s Handmade Vodka + Zing Zang Bloody Mary Mix.

Name: Aperol Spritz
Description: Aperol + Prosecco + lemon twist.

Name: Espresso Martini
Description: Vanilla Bean Vodka + RumChata + Monin True Brewed Espresso.

Name: Irish Coffee
Description: Jameson Irish Whiskey + coffee + real whipping cream.
